column5: Does any one know if the plugs come apart. The power plug and transducer. So you could run them through a rubber grommet. I would check my own,But a little hard to get into the boat.   Thanks Paul.
I am not sure but I read it somewhere that the cable is easily spliced.
Unfortunately they are molded on, I tried once with a broken transducer, no luck, but I have done the splicing and cut the transducer cable down to 6 feet.
